course.title: Certification Course for Mental Health and Well-Being Paraprofessionals
course.description: A 40-hour nationally aligned certification program equipping paraprofessionals with WHO mhGAP, QualityRights, and PCMH 2024–2028 compliant skills to provide ethical, trauma-informed peer support in the Philippines.

who.mhgap: WHO Mental Health Gap Action Programme (2023 update)
who.qualityRights: WHO QualityRights Initiative: Dignity, Recovery, and Human Rights in Mental Health

philippines.pcmh: Philippine Council for Mental Health (PCMH) Strategic Framework 2024–2028
philippines.ra11036: Republic Act No. 11036: The Mental Health Act of the Philippines
philippines.ra10173: Republic Act No. 10173: Data Privacy Act of 2012

meta.title: Cognitio+ | Mental Health Paraprofessional Certification (Philippines)
meta.description: Become a certified Mental Health and Well-Being Paraprofessional. Aligned with WHO mhGAP, QualityRights, and PCMH 2024–2028. 80% pass rate required. Valid for 2 years.
meta.keywords: mental health certification, paraprofessional training, Philippines mental health, WHO mhGAP, PCMH, peer support, online certification, Cognitio+, RA 11036, community mental health
meta.author: Cognitio+

og.title: Certification Course for Mental Health and Well-Being Paraprofessionals
og.description: Official Cognitio+ certification aligned with WHO and Philippine mental health frameworks. Valid for 2 years.

twitter.title: Cognitio+ Paraprofessional Certification
twitter.description: Train as a mental health paraprofessional in the Philippines. WHO & DOH-aligned.

certification.issuingAuthority: Cognitio+ in partnership with Philippine Council for Mental Health (PCMH)
